column3: There are still some more tagged, if someone else wants to take care of them (ideally the pull request author or a reviewer): https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=label%3A%22Needs+backport%22+is%3Aclosed

utACK

Would it make sense to postpone some of the backports to 0.17.2? It seems like new things to backport to 0.17 are added all the time, which is okay, but at some point we'd
